title: Microsoft Office 2013 Multi-Language Proofing Tools SP1 x86-x64
description:
About this release

This ISO compilation includes 52 single Proofing Tools installers for Office 2013 products (x86/x64)

Works with: Excel 2013, OneNote 2013, Outlook 2013, PowerPoint 2013, Word 2013

Available for the following languages
Arabic, Bulgarian, Basque, Catalan, Chinese (Simplified), Chinese (Traditional), Croatian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, English, Estonian, Finnish, French, Galician, German, Greek, Gujarati, Hebrew, Hindi, Hungarian, Indonesian, Italian, Japanese, Kannada, Kazakh, Korean, Latvian, Lithuanian, Malay (Latin), Marathi, Norwegian BokmÃ¥l, Norwegian Nynorsk, Polish, Portuguese (Brazil), Portuguese (Portugal), Punjabi (Gurmukhi), Romanian, Russian, Serbian (Cyrillic, Serbia), Serbian (Latin, Serbia), Slovak, Slovenian, Spanish, Swedish, Tamil, Telugu, Thai, Turkish, Ukrainian, Urdu, Vietnamese

Usage
- Mount / burn / extract
- Install Proofing Tools then apply Service Pack 1, restart Office
- Just use the proofing tools as you normally would - you should now see them for your newly installed langauge. For example, you can set your proofing language to the new language to use spell check (if available.

About Proofing Tools

Depending on which language you are using, proofing tools can check spelling or grammar, hyphenate text, and look up words in the thesaurus.
You can switch between proofing tools by selecting a different language for your document.

Spelling checker
Flags words in a document that may not be spelled correctly and may provide suggested replacements.

Grammar/Style checker
Verifies written text for grammatical correctness and detects stylistic problems.

Thesaurus
Lists synonyms and antonyms of words (if any are available).

Translation Dictionaries
Allows you to translate single words or short phrases.

AutoCorrect List
Fixes typos and misspelled words and inserts symbols and other pieces of text.

Hyphenator
Automatically breaks words at the end of lines and adds hyphens to help justify text within a line.

Contextual Speller
Flags words that are spelled correctly but are not the correct words in the given context.

Please seed for a while, thanks !
